name: LD49 Stable Mind
description:
best played in fullscreen

Kinda wasted the whole compo time trying (and failing) to make a cool unstable ecosystem game where you have bunnies and foxes and the population goes out of control. Didn't work so I made this today in 6 hours and submitted to the Jam instead

Tutorial
  • Move the pusher box with the mouse
  • Use WASD to blow wind and control the feather
  • Don't let the feather touch the red stuff
